General.Name: Youil Energy Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Youil Energy Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures secondary batteries and fuel cells in South Korea. It offers notching systems, cell stackings, and EV module and pack assemblies; roll to roll sputters, OLEDs, in-line sputters, and CIGS evaporators; and ICT lamination products and solar equipment. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
